alert.note: Alert for Santa Barbara County Central Coast Beaches; Santa Barbara County Inland Central Coast (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued July 24 at 4:42AM PDT until July 24 at 9:00AM PDT by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM PDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...Santa Barbara County Central Coast Beaches and Santa Barbara County Inland Central Coast. * WHEN...Until 9 AM PDT this morning. * IMPACTS...Very low visibility will create dangerous driving conditions on area roadways, including Highways 1 and 101 and State Route 246.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Santa Barbara County Central Coast Beaches; Santa Barbara County Inland Central Coast
